description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              The Opportunity: Work with the world’s largest shopper marketing & activation agency. Develop your career with a leading global network. If you have experience managing large-scale Promoter Networks or Activations, and are interested in rapidly developing your career, please contact us!
              

              Responsibilities:
              
              1.	Project Management:
              
              -	Large-scale brand promoter system management
              
              -	Focus on Modern Trade channels
              
              -	Manage nationwide recruiting system
              
              -	Develop training strategy and materials
              
              -	Oversee regional leaders stationed in Hanoi, Danang, Can Tho
              
              -	Manage project budgets
              
              -	Ensure accurate and timely reporting
              
              -	Conduct monthly analysis to gather learnings for each monthly report
              

              2.	Shopper Marketing:
              
              -	Develop strategic shopper marketing approach to the brand promoter network
              
              -	Update learnings from the channels into the strategic planning
              
              -	Work closely with agency creative team to develop creative solutions for the channels
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Experience managing at least one of the following:
              
              o	Large-scale field force of brand promoters
              
              o	Large-scale activation campaigns
              
              -	Minimum 3 years of project management experience
              
              -	Training skills
              
              -	Leadership & motivational skills
              
              -	Organizing and Planning Skills
              
              -	MS Office proficiency
              
              -	Pro-active, Self-motivated, Result-oriented
              

              Salary and Incentives:
              
              -	Attractive salary package to be aligned based on candidate experience
